Uses of Package
org.netbeans.editor.view.spi

  • Packages that use org.netbeans.editor.view.spi 
    Package Description
    org.netbeans.editor.view.spi  
    org.netbeans.lib.editor.view  
  • Classes in org.netbeans.editor.view.spi used by org.netbeans.editor.view.spi 
    Class and Description
    FlyView
    Interface marking the flyweight views.
    LockView
    View that allow to lock the view hierarchy.
    ViewInsets
    Immutable analogy of the Insets based on floats.
    ViewLayoutQueue
    This is a layout queue similar to the LayoutQueue with certain improvements.
    ViewLayoutState
    Wrapper around a view that caches computed layout information about preferred, minimum and maximum span along minor axis and the preferred span along the major axis.
    ViewRenderingContext
    Context used for rendering of a view.
  • Classes in org.netbeans.editor.view.spi used by org.netbeans.lib.editor.view 
    Class and Description
    EstimatedSpanView
    Views that implement this interface signal that they work in a mode when they just estimate their size instead of exact measurements that are likely more expensive for computation.
    ViewInsets
    Immutable analogy of the Insets based on floats.
    ViewLayoutQueue
    This is a layout queue similar to the LayoutQueue with certain improvements.
    ViewLayoutState
    Wrapper around a view that caches computed layout information about preferred, minimum and maximum span along minor axis and the preferred span along the major axis.
    ViewLayoutState.Parent
    Interface that the parent view of the view wrapped by ViewLayoutState is expected to implement.
